name: La Llorona Wants Your Soul
storyline: You should fear the presence of 'LA LLORONA,' help a group of friends to solve the mystery and free the tormented soul while she plays with your mind and your most basic fears in this survival horror story based on a true event.
summary: La Llorona wants your soul offers a unique horror experience based on real events that occurred in Mexico, follw the tormented soul of a woman who lost her children and every night roams the town in search of them and the one who took them. In this story, you control a group of 4 paranormal investigators seeking to solve the mystery and find La Llorona's children to free the pain of the restless soul.
